Posts.Content: Regarding your concern about how did you end up with inavsive cancer inspiteof having your screening mammograme every year since you are 30 years old. The main aim of screaning mammagram is to discover the breast cancer at early stage & that what happen in your case, you have an early stage breast cancer.  not having reguler screaning mammograme will incease the risk of getting  advance stage breast cancer. It is not essential that all inavsive breast cancer shoud originate from DCIS.
